post.body: My fav. is Gumwrapper Cranes. Elevating the ordinary and mundane to art: http://www.flickr.com/photos/jannygirl/3063083861/
Nice new avatar btw.
NS. Not having Bohemian Rapsody is such a crime.
Yep. Twitter has definitely become a post-date or Sat evening/Sunday morning wrap ritual. Good folks abound.
I think The Last Christmas will be right up your alley (Santa's getn' revent and he's packn') http://www.thelastchristmas.com/
Indeed. Efficient & intuitive iPhone affordances seem to be balanced on a knife-edge. But when its done right, it's pure sex.
Ah, but do you know about LARB? Yummy.
Having worked with them in the past, HSBC's (and most bank's) definition of 'programmer' is very dubious.
Don't forget glasses-on-a-string. Ya' know, for that ultra-hip AARP look that I hear is all the rage in Canuck-land now.
@al3x (of Twitter) uses Yep http://tinyurl.com/9sg47g. As long as you don't mind being OSX-only, it seems to work quite well.
As long as there's affordable cotton we'll have denim. As long as we have denim, there will be jeans.
Honey you deserve _all_ those kind words (and that big head).
I'm liking Timo Maas. You should do a blup.fm DJ page.
It's at least one detailed and timely perspective. There doesn't seem to be a similar source from the Israeli side. Try @bbc .
Here 'ya go. Jews against Israeli Gaza attacks http://tinyurl.com/83kaqd
Happy to be a wow-catalyst. Myself, I'm still waiting for the Uni-ball Kuru Togas to get re-stocked: http://tinyurl.com/6j9ebk
The details on prev. 'magic' indoor snowstorm. It's quite an amazing effect: http://tinyurl.com/8qge9n
The real indoor snow 'storm' at Tyson's Galleria brightened my day. It's like something out of a fairytale. Very cool application of tech.
Just started a Chronotron game for the sole purpose of listening to the music.
Ooh Rah! I finally worked out to a solution to a thorny problem I've been working on for the past 3 days. Time for the laundry--literally.
Having a much-belated afternoon coffee & fine-tuning planning for the rest of xmas shopping. Looks like it's going down to the wire--again.
Talk about uninvited guests, it looks like the Fail Whale and his feathered friends have come home for the holidays. No eggnog for you!
Perhaps I got a bad batch, but Sierra Nevada's Wet Hop Harvest ale disappoints. I'm not tasting any grassy/piney notes.
Woot! My Dr. Horrible DVD just shipped.
Boston Big Pictures for 2008: http://tinyurl.com/4ey462 I'm eagerly anticipating the next two installments.
If I was the father of that 12yd girl, I'd now likely be facing capital murder charges against whomever assaulted her. Sad all around.
O.k. I give. Now following @unfollowme .
No. The _key_ point being, accidental shooting or not, the sidearm should have never even left the holster.
Evidence presented so far illustrates that cop in Oakland had zero reason to fear for his life or the lives of others. What a fucktard.
Sadly, executing an all too common anti-pattern: Bypassing security 'cuz I'm building something and I need to "get shit done".
Joe Cocker, Feeln' Alright â™«
Time to chill when chilln' -> hot genmaicha + jacuzzi.
Wow. This Onion mac-spoof video has such great production quality: http://tinyurl.com/8x53o8
In an Audition Economy™ where Tribal Mores™ hold sway why is anyone surprised that fans pay for free music (e.g. NIN Ghosts)?
Efailing today. Sorry for late comms. Not sure yet of the root cause, but msgs should be de-queuing now.
I hated Risk too. Too many 'house rules' and I always had the worst luck with starting countries. http://tinyurl.com/5kl2se
A few hard-boiled egg whites, fresh tangerines, and double-shot espresso for breakfast. I could get used to this.
Finally test-driving the new espresso machine. First impressions are it's much mind-work and fussing around for my early-morning brain.
The gamut of product categories and brands that use the name or are classified as "blender" is astounding.
Nice UK Guardian info-graphic on the Gaza time line: http://tinyurl.com/7zayxc
